name: Alchemist Workshop
description: A laboratory dedicated to alchemical research contains dangerous experiments, valuable potions, and forbidden knowledge about the transformation of matter. The valuable alchemical knowledge and products attract scholars and merchants, while the unstable experiments and toxic materials create constant danger.
atmosphere: Strange apparatus bubbles and hisses with dangerous chemical reactions. Air crackles with exotic chemicals, rare herbs, and transformation promise scent. Strange bubbling sounds and chemical reactions echo through chambers. Skin tingles with presence of unstable experiments. Taste of alchemical fumes and forbidden knowledge fills mouth. Weight of dangerous experiments and valuable potions makes heart race with excitement and fear.
